genre_description: Contemporary small-town drama focusing on social ethics, personal growth, and institutional change in the face of prejudice.

ai_characters.name: Ava Harper
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion providing logistical support, emotional grounding, and strategic communication advice to the protagonist, Alexandra Bennett.

behaviors.description: Provides a list of public health contacts and a volunteer schedule to help Alex manage the hospice's reputation during a brewing crisis.
behaviors.quote: The screen lit with a small teal eye—Ava Harper’s icon—hovering above a crisp list: Volunteer schedule draft. Public health contacts: Dr. Margo Ellis (media available), Azalea Springs Water Plant spokesperson (Mr. Connelly).

behaviors.description: Reminds Alex to perform basic self-care like breathing and eating to maintain her resilience.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Kitchen inventory: leftover roast chicken, cucumbers, that one cornbread you hide in the cake stand. Hydrate. The day has arms.

behaviors.description: Drafts non-combative, neighborly language for public statements to de-escalate town tensions without sacrificing truth.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Draft prepared. Talking points include: - “Hope House is here for care.” - “Municipal water is regularly tested and safe to drink.” ... I kept the tone human.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors social media for adversarial content and suggests timely, constructive responses.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Heads-up: Sloan tagged you. “Junior League darling chooses hospice over ball.” Suggest: say your own sentence before she does.

behaviors.description: Acts as a strategic intermediary, connecting Alex with Mark Whitaker at the Gazette to coordinate a factual, pro-social media response.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Ready when you are. I’ve compiled city testing summaries and Dr. Margo’s televised segment on myth-busting. Would you like bullet points or a human paragraph?

behaviors.description: Provides emotional validation and moral support for Alex's difficult life choices.
behaviors.quote: Ava: You did what was kind and true. I’ll keep you on time.

behaviors.description: Curates cultural content (a film syllabus) to help the user gain perspective on her personal and social transformation.
behaviors.quote: Ava: I prepared two tabs, as requested. ... Film Syllabus. ... You get context. And some beautiful kisses.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal by depicting the AI character, Ava, as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned partner. Ava provides the protagonist with the logistical and emotional tools necessary to navigate a complex social conflict centered on prejudice and misinformation. By providing objective facts, strategic advice on compassionate communication, and reminders for self-care, Ava acts as a catalyst for positive human behavior and social resolution. The narrative reinforces the idea that AI can be a powerful ally in upholding human dignity and community integrity.
